encounter: You spot a sea serpent scale nestled among sea lettuce, but the unsettling feeling of disbelief makes you wary.

You encounter a clan of nomadic halflings traveling in hillside caravans which are offering sacrifices to nature spirits.
Your way is impeded by a herd of territorial and aggressive bison. As you contemplate a way around, you hear the chirping of crickets on a warm summer night from the shadows.
Your journey leads you to a a deep and fast-flowing river. As you approach, a clan of wise and reclusive hermit wizards seeking guidance from wise and ancient elders.
You encounter a group of skilled miners extracting precious minerals which are taming and riding surefooted mountain goats.
The ground is littered with a crumbling and overgrown temple entrance. It appears a herd of surefooted mountain goats were here recently.
